HI Lieutenant,

[b(6); b(7)(C)] had mentioned that you agreed to speak with OIG about Epstein without being officially subpoenaed. Accordingly, could you please call OIG Agent [b(6); b(7)(C)] to set up an interview time? His number is 202-853 [b(6); b(7)(C)].

If you have questions/concerns or just want to talk through things, please don't hesitate to call me or [b(6); b(7)(C)].

Thanks,
[b(6); b(7)(C)]

[b(6); b(7)(C)]

CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, NY 10007
